menu_items.name: Noodle Bar Wednesday
menu_items.description: A selection of noodles with various toppings and sauces available every Wednesday.

menu_items.name: Build-A-Bowl Thursday
menu_items.description: Create your own bowl with a variety of ingredients available every Thursday.

menu_items.name: Fish & Chip Friday
menu_items.description: Traditional fish and chips available every Friday.

menu_items.name: Buffet
menu_items.description: Buffet with a variety of dishes, includes daily beverage and dessert features.

name: Manchu Wok
address: University Community Centre, 1151 Richmond Street, London

menu_items.name: Spring Rolls
menu_items.description: Crispy rolls filled with cabbage, carrots, and glass noodles. Served with sweet chili sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Dumplings
menu_items.description: Steamed dumplings stuffed with minced chicken, ginger, and scallions. Served with soy dipping sauce.

menu_items.name: Kung Pao Tofu
menu_items.description: Stir-fried tofu with peanuts, bell peppers, and spicy Kung Pao sauce. Served with steamed rice.

menu_items.name: Beef and Broccoli
menu_items.description: Tender beef slices stir-fried with broccoli in a savory oyster sauce. Served with jasmine rice.

menu_items.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
menu_items.description: Crispy chicken pieces tossed in sweet and sour sauce with pineapple and bell peppers.

menu_items.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
menu_items.description: Fried rice with mixed vegetables, soy sauce, and a hint of sesame oil.

menu_items.name: Mango Pudding
menu_items.description: Creamy mango pudding topped with fresh mango slices.

menu_items.name: Almond Cookies
menu_items.description: Traditional Chinese almond cookies with a crunchy texture.

menu_items.name: Jasmine Green Tea
menu_items.description: Fragrant green tea with a hint of jasmine aroma.

menu_items.name: Lychee Lemonade
menu_items.description: Refreshing lemonade infused with lychee syrup and mint leaves.
